successes.title: HiddenRadio2 Bluetooth MultiSpeaker
successes.description: The simplest most advanced wireless Multi Speaker for iPhone, iPad + Android ever in compact form. Touch the cap to elevate your sound!

Pledges.description: HIDDEN POUCH | Get on board and be part of the team, getting all the updates and insights as we develop the product. To say thanks we’ll send you a protective silver microfiber cleaning pouch for your smartphone!
HIDDEN T-SHIRT | You’re amazing! Every single dollar brings us closer to our goal. To say thanks, we’ll send you a 100% subtly HIDDEN branded t-shirt!

EARLY BIRDS | You’re already in! For helping us get the ball rolling, you’ll get a HiddenRadio2 in the new Platinum Silver edition before anyone else for only $119! At this special price we just ask that you help us get the word out!
ON BOARD | You’ll be one of the first to get the HiddenRadio in Platinum Silver. This will normally retail for $199, but you will be able fill your home with crystal clear sound for only $149.

EARLY BIRD PAIR | You’ll get TWO HiddenRadio2 (to be used in sync or separately), each in your choice of Platinum Silver or High Gloss Black. Get these before anyone else and use them simultaneously to lift the roof throughout your home, or have one at home and one at the office.

DOUBLE UP | You’ll get TWO HiddenRadio2 (to be used in sync or separately), each in your choice of Platinum Silver or High Gloss Black. Get these before anyone else and use them simultaneously to lift the roof throughout your home, or have one at home and one at the office.

HELLO COLOR | For Kickstarter backers only! You’ll get TWO HiddenRadio2 (to be used in sync or separately), each in your choice of color. Not only will you be annoying the neighbors you’ll look good doing it!

BLACK CHROME LIMITED EDITION | Only on Kickstarter! You’ll get TWO HiddenRadio2 (to be used in sync or separately) in the gorgeous limited Black Chrome edition, each individually numbered. We’re only making 100 sets of these!

BLACK CHROME LIMITED EDITION II
If you missed it, you can still get TWO units in the gorgeous limited Black Chrome finish! Please note these are unnumbered.
